timeline.message:
Add getNumber() to JSON types

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Integer should be replaced by Number in the javadoc
timeline.author: julianladisch

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java
index daf7c79ce..eb5570bf7 100644
--- a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java
+++ b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java

@@ -121,8 +121,8 @@ public class JsonArray implements Iterable<Object>, ClusterSerializable, Shareab
    * Get the Integer at position {@code pos} in the array,
    *
    * @param pos the position in the array
-   * @return the Integer, or null if a null value present
-   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value cannot be converted to Integer
+   * @return the Number, or null if a null value present
+   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value cannot be converted to Number
    */
   public Number getNumber(int pos) {
     return (Number) list.get(pos);

timeline.message:
Fix copy paste bug on javadoc

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * Get the Integer at position {@code pos} in the array,
          
          
            
               * Get the Number at position {@code pos} in the array,
timeline.author: julianladisch

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java
index eb5570bf7..baf403e98 100644
--- a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java
+++ b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java

@@ -118,11 +118,11 @@ public class JsonArray implements Iterable<Object>, ClusterSerializable, Shareab
   }
 
   /**
-   * Get the Integer at position {@code pos} in the array,
+   * Get the Number at position {@code pos} in the array,
    *
    * @param pos the position in the array
    * @return the Number, or null if a null value present
-   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value cannot be converted to Number
+   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not a Number
    */
   public Number getNumber(int pos) {
     return (Number) list.get(pos);

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value cannot be converted to Number
          
          
            
               * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not a Number
          
      
    
    
  

There is no conversion, only casting.
timeline.author: julianladisch

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java
index eb5570bf7..baf403e98 100644
--- a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java
+++ b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonArray.java

@@ -118,11 +118,11 @@ public class JsonArray implements Iterable<Object>, ClusterSerializable, Shareab
   }
 
   /**
-   * Get the Integer at position {@code pos} in the array,
+   * Get the Number at position {@code pos} in the array,
    *
    * @param pos the position in the array
    * @return the Number, or null if a null value present
-   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value cannot be converted to Number
+   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not a Number
    */
   public Number getNumber(int pos) {
     return (Number) list.get(pos);

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonObject.java b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonObject.java
index 85d82d521..8c5c9321c 100644
--- a/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonObject.java
+++ b/src/main/java/io/vertx/core/json/JsonObject.java

@@ -150,7 +150,7 @@ public class JsonObject implements Iterable<Map.Entry<String, Object>>, ClusterS
    *
    * @param key the key to return the value for
    * @return the value or null if no value for that key
-   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not an Number
+   * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException if the value is not a Number
    */
   public Number getNumber(String key) {
     Objects.requireNonNull(key);

timeline.message:
Add fixes to javadoc + test for new added method

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>
